Question: According to this person, Freud conceived the unconscious solely as a repository of repressed emotions and desires.
Hints: In 1909 this person and Freud traveled to the conference at Clark University.
This person went on to say "the main point is to get a young and insecure science into a place of safety during an earthquake".
In December 1937, this person left Zurich again for an extensive tour of India with Fowler McCormick.
